caption.center: CEDRIC A. LEATH Appellant v. STATE OF FLORIDA, Appellee.

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District.

opinion.posture: Appeal pursuant to Fla.R.App.P. 9.140(i) from the Circuit Court for Polk County; Robert A. Young, Judge.
opinion.opinion_text:
Affirmed.
THREADGILL, A.C.J., and WHATLEY and GREEN, JJ., Concur.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE REHEARING MOTION AND, IF FILED, DETERMINED.
